p: It was reported that rutin, 5,7-dimethoxyflavanone-4′-O-β-d-glucopyranoside and 5,7,3′-trihydroxy-flavanone- 4′-O-β-d-glucopyranoside were active against PI-3 (Parainfluenza-3 virus), while 5,7-dimethoxyflavanone-4′-O-[2″-O- (5″′-O-trans-cinnamoyl)-β-d-apiofuranosyl]-β-d- glucopyranoside inhibited potently HSV-1 (Orhan et al. 2009).
